Sofia. 'Druzhba 1' . Mons Properties is pleased to present for sale one bedroom furnished apartment in the town of. Sofia. 'Druzhba 1' . The property has a total area of 62 m2., the floor area is 55 m2. It is located on the second floor of a five-storey brick building, built in 2025. The layout is as follows. Heating is by electricity. The apartment is sold furnished, ready to move in and fully equipped with everything needed for a household. There is a possibility to buy an underground double garage. The building offers authentic second, third and fourth floor apartments. Advantages of the property: new construction, modern building with elevator, bright rooms, peaceful environment. Amenities nearby: shops, pharmacies, kindergartens and schools, green areas and recreation areas.
